tag_list: entrepreneur, business-angel, lead-generation-expert, business-administrator, accountant, mba
overview:
Juan Ignacio Serrot is an angel investor that invests in internet projects. Juan Ignacio also works in Codere (a gambling & casino company) coordinating the audit department for the Latin American market.

He was a member of Ernst & Young audit department for 3 years, where he could gain considerable experience in the telecommunication and entertainment industry. After that he worked for 2 years in Transaction Advisory Services department, providing corporate and private equity firms with due diligence support, transaction accounting support, and other M&A advice.
